decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressively attacking the opponent's life total while disrupting their hand with cards like Duress and Thoughtseize. The key strategy revolves around playing efficiently costed threats like Vein Ripper and Bloodtithe Harvester, while generating card advantage with Dusk Legion Zealot and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord provides additional ways to gain value from our creatures, and Fatal Push helps deal with opposing threats. Overall, this deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain a steady stream of threats throughout the game.

The deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Vein Ripper, supported by powerful cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize, while maintaining card advantage with Dusk Legion Zealot. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and maximize the efficiency of its creatures. Overall, the deck is built to apply pressure early and keep the opponent on the back foot throughout the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Discover mechanic to ramp into powerful creatures and spells, while also incorporating a combo aspect with Trumpeting Carnosaur and Leyline Binding to control the board. The inclusion of Keruga, the Macrosage as a companion allows for card advantage and further consistency in drawing into key pieces. The deck also features a mix of triome lands for mana fixing and flexibility, along with various removal and utility spells to support the main game plan. Ultimately, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a strong board presence and consistent combo potential.

This UW Control deck focuses on denying opponents resources and maintaining board control through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. By efficiently disrupting the opponent's game plan and generating card advantage, the deck aims to slowly grind out wins by controlling the game tempo and outvaluing the opponent. The deck also utilizes win conditions such as Shark Typhoon and Hullbreaker Horror to close out games once it has established control. Overall, the key strategy is to control the game state and outlast the opponent through resource management and efficient threats.

This deck focuses on creating a powerful combo using Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II to generate tokens and overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Eldritch Evolution and Raffine's Informant to search for combo pieces and maintain card advantage. With cards like Esika's Chariot and Skysovereign, Consul Flagship providing additional threats and removal, this deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and dominate the battlefield. Additionally, cards like Duress and Thoughtseize disrupt the opponent's strategy, allowing the combo to go off smoothly.

This deck focuses on utilizing Arclight Phoenix as a powerful recurring threat while maintaining a fast-paced aggressive strategy. The key concept of this deck is to efficiently fill the graveyard with spells like Consider and Cling to Dust to bring back Arclight Phoenix multiple times in a single game. By including cards like Ledger Shredder and Picklock Prankster to enable graveyard shenanigans and disruption like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push for control, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a flurry of powerful spells and creatures while maintaining a disruptive game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing the powerful abilities of Niv-Mizzet Reborn to control the game by accessing a wide range of multicolor cards. The key strategy involves using Niv-Mizzet's ability to draw cards and gain card advantage, while also using control spells and removal to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck includes a variety of powerful multicolor spells and lands to ensure that Niv-Mizzet can consistently provide value and keep the opponent on the back foot.

This deck focuses on utilizing Lotus Field to generate a large amount of mana quickly in order to cast powerful spells and combo off. It includes cards like Thespian's Stage and Sylvan Scrying to find Lotus Field, as well as Emergent Ultimatum to search for key combo pieces. The deck also includes cards like Omniscience and Hidden Strings to take advantage of the mana produced by Lotus Field. Overall, the strategy revolves around ramping up mana production and casting game-winning spells in a short amount of time.

This deck focuses on quickly getting Arclight Phoenix into the graveyard and then bringing it back onto the battlefield multiple times. It includes a mix of cheap spells and card draw to fill the graveyard, as well as ways to protect the Phoenix once it's on the battlefield. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with quick, recurring threats and maintain control through efficient spells and card advantage. The use of cards like Ledger Shredder and Picklock Prankster also adds disruption to the opponent's game plan.

This deck is focused on aggressively attacking the opponent using a mixture of efficient creatures like Vein Ripper and Dusk Legion Zealot, along with disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the game. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord helps to pump up your creatures and provide additional value. The deck also includes some card advantage in the form of Preacher of the Schism and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker, while Duress and Bitter Triumph provide additional disruption and removal. The mana base is designed to support a fast, aggressive game plan with a mix of lands that produce both black and red mana.
